channel.title: How to make a server status checker inside a topic?
channel.description: Hello, I see allot of server topics with the status of the server inside it. My question: How can i make that for my own server? Gr Yohurt. (I've searched already but i didnt found anything usefull)

item.title: How to make a server status checker inside a topic?
item.dc:creator: @Yohurt Yohurt
item.description:
@Yohurt wrote:

I think you understand the questoin wrong. I want to know how to add the status of a server inside a topic.

Read full topic
